messages.message:
Hey team, if a human reviewer alters a result in the HR screen, derived fields do not get re-computed. We recently introduced a feature so that if a document gets reclassified we automatically re-extract field values. I would expect that we would want the same things for derived fields to cascade any changes and revalidate the results

cc @Kaustubh (KD)
Let's create a ticket for this when you have a minute
I don't have much context on derived fields. However, for reextraction we'd have to chat with Anil's team @Abhishek Adupa

btw the same issue occurs for both derived fields and custom function fields

the values for derived fields and custom function fields depend on other fields, so it makes sense that the user would like to re-compute derived fields or custom function fields if any input field value is changed
